com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.logUtils

接口 Timber.Tree

  • 所有已知子接口:
    Timber.TaggedTree
    所有已知实现类:
    Timber.DebugTree, Timber.HollowTree
    封闭类:
    Timber

    public static interface Timber.Tree
    A facade for handling logging calls. Install instances via Timber.plant(com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.logUtils.Timber.Tree).

    • 方法概要

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
